## Description {#details}

Base class of all SIMD vector types.

<SectionDefinition>

## Protected Member Attributes

### ElementQuantity {#a9531bece2eddd17e21a9fd250fcbe50a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="const unsigned llvm::VectorType::ElementQuantity"
  labels = {["protected"]}>
The element quantity of this vector.

The meaning of this value depends on the type of vector:
<ul>
<li>For <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> = &lt;ElementQuantity x ty&gt;, there are exactly ElementQuantity elements in this vector.</li>
<li>For <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalablevectortype">ScalableVectorType</a> = &lt;vscale x ElementQuantity x ty&gt;, there are vscale &#42; ElementQuantity elements in this vector, where vscale is a runtime-constant integer greater than 0.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h/#l00452">452</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h">DerivedTypes.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### ContainedType {#ad4e45eba39500cdd8464942a294925dc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Type&#42; llvm::VectorType::ContainedType</>}>
A fully specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> is of the form &lt;vscale x n x Ty&gt;.

&#39;n&#39; is the minimum number of elements of type Ty contained within the vector, and &#39;vscale x&#39; indicates that the total element count is an integer multiple of &#39;n&#39;, where the multiple is either guaranteed to be one, or is statically unknown at compile time.

If the multiple is known to be 1, then the extra term is discarded in textual IR:

&lt;4 x i32&gt; - a vector containing 4 i32s &lt;vscale x 4 x i32&gt; - a vector containing an unknown integer multiple of 4 i32s The element type of the vector.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h/#l00442">442</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/derivedtypes-h">DerivedTypes.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
